resources.string:
"Hello adventurer... Once I was like you - strong and confident...
 And now I'm dead... But I can't leave this place... 
Not until I have my _dried rose_... It's very important to me... 
Some monster stole it from my body..."

"Hello adventurer... Once I was like you - strong and confident...\n And now I'm dead... But I can't leave this place... \nNot until I have my revenge... Slay the _fetid rat_, that has taken my life..."
